About me

Hi! My name is Sasha, or Alexander if you prefer the official way. I am a Web Developer, as you probably have figured out by now. Although I am relatively new to the world of web development, with no doubt I am very dedicated to what I do, and I am determined to constant professional and personal growth. I am also interested in topics like photography and videography which gives me an extra eye for little details.
